Tag Validation

Since:
Last Modified: $Date: 2004/04/19 15:52:45 $

Precondition:

Enter Tag page appears

Test Steps:

  1. Enter tag "1" in Enter Tag Page
  2. Check the error message on the page
  3. Re-enter tag "V2"

Expected Result:

  1. Step1-2: Invalid tag error message appears. "Next" and "Finish" are disabled
  2. Step 4: Error message is gone. "Next" and "Finish" are enabled.
